info.title: Equihome Fund Simulation Engine
info.description: API for the Equihome Fund Simulation Engine

post.description:
Create and run a new simulation.

Args:
    config: Configuration for the simulation
    background_tasks: Background tasks for running the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    SimulationResponse: Response with simulation ID and status

get.description:
List all simulations.

Args:
    status: Filter by status (created, running, completed, or failed)
    limit: Maximum number of simulations to return
    offset: Offset for pagination

Returns:
    Dict[str, Any]: List of simulations and pagination info

Get the status of a simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    include_partial_results: Whether to include partial results in the response

Returns:
    Dict: Status of the simulation with optional partial results

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found

parameters.name: include_partial_results

schema.description: Include partial results in the response
schema.title: Include Partial Results

parameters.description: Include partial results in the response

get.description:
Get a simulation by ID.

This endpoint returns the simulation metadata including configuration
parameters, status, and creation time. It doesn't include the full
results, which are available through the /results endpoint.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    Dict[str, Any]: Simulation data

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found

delete.description:
Delete a simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    Dict[str, str]: Success message

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found

get.description:
@backend
Get the results of a completed simulation, supporting both yearly and monthly granularity.
Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    time_granularity: 'yearly' or 'monthly'
Returns:
    Dict[str, Any]: Simulation results
Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

parameters.name: time_granularity

schema.description: Time granularity for results (yearly or monthly)
schema.title: Time Granularity

parameters.description: Time granularity for results (yearly or monthly)

post.description:
Cancel a running simulation without deleting its data.

This endpoint stops the background processing of a simulation
but keeps any partial results and marks the simulation as 'cancelled'.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation to cancel

Returns:
    Dict[str, Any]: Response with status message

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not in a cancellable state

get.description:
@backend
Get visualization data for a simulation, supporting both yearly and monthly granularity and advanced chart types.
Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    chart_type: Type of chart to retrieve (basic, fan, heatmap, tornado, multi_dim_sensitivity, correlation_matrix, etc.)
    time_granularity: 'yearly' or 'monthly'
    ...
Returns:
    Dict[str, Any]: Visualization data

parameters.name: chart_type

schema.description: Type of chart to retrieve (basic, fan, heatmap, tornado, multi_dim_sensitivity, correlation_matrix, etc.)
schema.title: Chart Type

parameters.description: Type of chart to retrieve (basic, fan, heatmap, tornado, multi_dim_sensitivity, correlation_matrix, etc.)

parameters.name: format

schema.description: Chart format (bar, line, pie, area, summary)
schema.title: Format

parameters.description: Chart format (bar, line, pie, area, summary)

parameters.name: metrics

schema.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to include
schema.title: Metrics

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to include

schema.title: Response Get Simulation Visualization Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Visualization Get

get.description: Get Monte Carlo visualization data for a simulation.

parameters.name: metrics

schema.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to include
schema.title: Metrics

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to include

schema.title: Response Get Monte Carlo Visualization Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Monte Carlo Visualization Get

get.description: Get all loans with analytics for a simulation.

schema.title: Response Get Simulation Loans Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Loans  Get

get.description: Get analytics for a single loan.

schema.title: Response Get Simulation Loan Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Loans  Loan Id   Get

get.description: Get portfolio evolution time series for a simulation.

schema.title: Response Get Portfolio Evolution Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Portfolio Evolution  Get

get.description: Get recycling ratio and capital velocity for a simulation.

schema.title: Response Get Recycling Analytics Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Recycling  Get

get.description: Get cohort/time-slice analytics for a simulation.

schema.title: Response Get Cohort Analytics Api Simulations  Simulation Id  Cohorts  Get

get.description: Export simulation analytics as CSV or JSON.

post.description:
Run an existing simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation to run
    background_tasks: Background tasks for running the simulation

Returns:
    Dict: Status of the simulation

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found

get.description:
Get the GP entity economics for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    GPEntityEconomicsResponse: GP entity economics

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the basic GP entity economics for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    BasicEconomicsResponse: Basic GP entity economics

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the management company metrics for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    ManagementCompanyResponse: Management company metrics

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the team economics for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    TeamEconomicsResponse: Team economics

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the GP commitment for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    GPCommitmentResponse: GP commitment

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the GP entity cashflows for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    frequency: Frequency of cashflows (yearly or monthly)
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    GPEntityCashflowsResponse: GP entity cashflows

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the GP entity metrics for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    GPEntityMetricsResponse: GP entity metrics

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

Get the GP entity visualization data for a completed simulation.

Args:
    simulation_id: ID of the simulation
    chart_type: Type of chart to retrieve (cashflows, revenue_sources, yearly_revenue, expense_breakdown, cashflow_over_time, dividend_over_time, team_allocation, portfolio_evolution, all)
    time_granularity: Time granularity for time-series data (monthly, quarterly, yearly)
    cumulative: Whether to return cumulative data for time-series charts
    start_year: Start year for filtering time-series data
    end_year: End year for filtering time-series data
    token: Authentication token

Returns:
    VisualizationDataResponse: GP entity visualization data

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the simulation is not found or not completed

parameters.name: chart_type

schema.description: Type of chart to retrieve (cashflows, revenue_sources, yearly_revenue, expense_breakdown, cashflow_over_time, dividend_over_time, team_allocation, portfolio_evolution, all)
schema.title: Chart Type

parameters.description: Type of chart to retrieve (cashflows, revenue_sources, yearly_revenue, expense_breakdown, cashflow_over_time, dividend_over_time, team_allocation, portfolio_evolution, all)

parameters.name: time_granularity

schema.description: Time granularity for time-series data (monthly, quarterly, yearly)
schema.title: Time Granularity

parameters.description: Time granularity for time-series data (monthly, quarterly, yearly)

parameters.name: cumulative

schema.description: Whether to return cumulative data for time-series charts
schema.title: Cumulative

parameters.description: Whether to return cumulative data for time-series charts

parameters.name: start_year

schema.description: Start year for filtering time-series data
schema.title: Start Year

parameters.description: Start year for filtering time-series data

parameters.name: end_year

schema.description: End year for filtering time-series data
schema.title: End Year

parameters.description: End year for filtering time-series data

get.description:
Health check endpoint.

Returns basic information about the server and its status.

Returns:
    Dict with server status information

Simple ping endpoint.

Returns a simple response to check if the server is running.

Returns:
    Dict with pong message

Simple ping endpoint for the /api/health/ping path.

This is a duplicate of the /health/ping endpoint to support
frontend requests that use the /api prefix.

Returns:
    Dict with pong message

Get all configurations.

Returns:
    ConfigurationList: List of configurations

post.description:
Save a configuration.

Args:
    request: Configuration request

Returns:
    ConfigurationResponse: Saved configuration

get.description:
Get a configuration by ID.

Args:
    config_id: ID of the configuration

Returns:
    ConfigurationResponse: Configuration data

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the configuration is not found

put.description:
Update a configuration.

Args:
    config_id: ID of the configuration
    request: Configuration request

Returns:
    ConfigurationResponse: Updated configuration

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the configuration is not found

delete.description:
Delete a configuration.

Args:
    config_id: ID of the configuration

Returns:
    Dict: Success message

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the configuration is not found

get.description: Root endpoint.

post.description: Trigger a test simulation with predefined parameters and send updates over WebSocket.

BasicEconomicsResponse.title: BasicEconomicsResponse
BasicEconomicsResponse.description: Response model for basic GP entity economics.

CashflowResponse.title: CashflowResponse
CashflowResponse.description: Response model for a single cashflow.

GPEntityCashflowsResponse.description: Response model for GP entity cashflows.

GPEntityEconomicsResponse.title: GPEntityEconomicsResponse
GPEntityEconomicsResponse.description: Response model for GP entity economics.

GPEntityMetricsResponse.title: GPEntityMetricsResponse
GPEntityMetricsResponse.description: Response model for GP entity metrics.

GeographicDistributionResponse.title: GeographicDistributionResponse
GeographicDistributionResponse.description: Response model for geographic distribution data.

ManagementCompanyResponse.title: ManagementCompanyResponse
ManagementCompanyResponse.description: Response model for management company metrics.

PortfolioCompositionResponse.title: PortfolioCompositionResponse
PortfolioCompositionResponse.description: Response model for portfolio composition data.

correlation.title: Correlation
correlation.description: Correlation between appreciation and default rates (-1 to 1)

loan_size_std_dev.title: Loan Size Std Dev
loan_size_std_dev.description: Standard deviation of loan size in dollars

management_fee_basis.title: Management Fee Basis
management_fee_basis.description: Management fee basis (committed_capital, invested_capital, or nav)

distribution_policy.title: Distribution Policy
distribution_policy.description: Distribution policy (available_cash, income_only, return_of_capital, or reinvestment_priority)

force_exit_within_fund_term.title: Force Exit Within Fund Term
force_exit_within_fund_term.description: Force all loans to exit no later than the stated fund term

variation_factor.title: Variation Factor
variation_factor.description: Variation factor for Monte Carlo simulation (0-1)

optimization_objective.title: Optimization Objective
optimization_objective.description: Optimization objective (max_sharpe, min_volatility, efficient_risk, or efficient_return)

risk_free_rate.title: Risk Free Rate
risk_free_rate.description: Risk-free rate for Sharpe ratio calculation (0-1)

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the simulation (created, running, completed, or failed)

SimulationResponse.title: SimulationResponse
SimulationResponse.description: Response for a simulation creation request.
